channel.title: keyboards on Josh Wulf
channel.description: Recent content in keyboards on Josh Wulf

item.title: In Search of the Ultimate Keyboard Layout
item.description: In July of 2018, after 35 years of typing on QWERTY layout - 24 of those years touch-typing as a professional software developer and author, I switched to the Dvorak keyboard layout. I couldn't tell you why I did it. I just did. At the time I was training for a physique competition (that will be another blog post). But I don't know if that had anything to do with it (maybe it was a low-carb moment…).
